_prev_prog_3.EquipmentTested: regulators, leak detectors, exhaust fan and controls, dialer
_prev_prog_3.Description: Village of Attica Process Hazard Analysis (PHA). Safeguards at the Attica Wastewater Treatment Plant.**Two ton chlorine hoist to safaly unload and place the containers on the scales/cradles. **Vacuum chlorine regulator/check unit (no gas flow without vacuum). **Chlorine detector. **Exhaust fan and louver controls. **Vacuum/Pressure alarm switch. **Automatic dialer system to alert operators to system problems.

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
This summary will list the support documation used to file this RMP for the Village of Attica Wastewater Treatment Plant.

Call list A JPG
Chlorine Safety doc JPEG
leak flow chart GIF
endpoint map JPG               map of our distance to endpoint (1.3 miles)

To calculate our estimated resident population within our distance to endpoint we counted households and then used Wyoming County and Village of Attica census records to arrive at our final number.
To calculate our Alternative Release we assumed that a regulator was knocked off of the container valve. Our chlorine supplier (Jones Chemical) informed us that the flow through our container valve opened 1/2 turn would be intermittent due to the freezing/ thawing at the orfice. The leak could be stopped by a properly equiped operator simply closing the cotainer valve (1/2 turn).
